means.word_mean: 1. something regarded with special favor or liking;

sentences.sentence: "that book is one of my favorites"

means.word_mean: 3. a competitor thought likely to win
2. preferred above all others and treated with partiality;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"促成"; 2. 表形容词,"有……的"; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的;一定的;意志坚强的,立场坚定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de强调+fin界线+ite有……的→adj.明确的;一定的;意志坚强的,立场坚定的
e出+rud原始+ite有……的→走出原始状态→博学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优美的,高雅的,精致的;剧烈的,异常的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+quis寻求+ite有……的→adj.优美的,高雅的,精致的;剧烈的,异常的
favor好感,宠爱+ite有……的→adj.喜爱的,宠爱的
favorite[adj.喜爱的,宠爱的]→adj.喜爱的,宠爱的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有礼貌的,客气的;有教养的,文雅的
stems_affixes.word_buile: pol擦亮,文雅+ite有……的→adj.有礼貌的,客气的;有教养的,文雅的
bedlam混乱,骚乱+ite人或物→n.疯子,狂人

stems_affixes.value_cn: [集合名词]精华;精锐;中坚分子;精英

stems_affixes.word_buile: favor喜爱+ite人或物→n.[favourite]最喜欢的人或物 adj.喜爱的
favorite[n.[favourite]最喜欢的人或物 adj.喜爱的]→n.特别喜欢的人[或物]
gran颗粒+ite人或物→n.花岗岩,花岗石
social社会的+ite人或物→n.社会名流,名士
term+ite人或物→来自拉丁文termes白蚁
ex出+ped脚+ite促成→把脚跨出去→加快

Oh, actually grey is my favorite color, but I prefer something made from cotton, 100% cotton I mean.
French fries, washed down with a pint of soda, are a favorite part of fast-food lunches and dinners for millions of American youngsters
The deadline for applying to his favorite college was Nov.

Even if the question is ostensibly (表面上) about something outside the self (describe a fictional character or solve a problem of geopolitics), the essay invariably returns to the favorite topic: what is its impact on YOU
Make your own way"," Stand on your own two feet" or my mother's favorite remark when I was face-to-face with consequences of some action: Now that you've made your bed, lie on it.
